Texts.Chs: <如果你忽视了之前的警告并摄取了这种金属，要知道它会很快地重塑你的内在生物系统。你会变成一个空壳，最终完全变成一个对时间的破坏免疫的无名变异体。你实际上会永远变成一个脑死亡的外壳>
Texts.Eng: <Should you disregard the previous warning and ingest this metal, know that it will very swiftly rework your internal biology. You will become a hollow shell of your former self, and eventually completely transform into a nameless mutant immune to the ravages of time. You will effectively become a brain-dead husk for eternity.>

Texts.Chs: <译文: 我们做到了。我们穿越到一个新的宇宙。不幸的是，我们现在被困在这里，因为核心系统的一个不幸的问题。为了返回，我们需要在这个宇宙中找到一个等效的能量源。行动已经踏入正轨。>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: We did it. We crossed over into a new universe. Unfortunately...we are now stuck here due to a rather unfortunate problem with the Core. We will need to locate an equivalent power source in this universe in order to return. Efforts are already underway.>

Texts.Chs: <我们已经播种了第一个原毒世界。一种有趣的生物作物是一种新的形式... 我敢称之为金属？它具有类似的性质。我们认为它是原始的。它似乎非常适合能量转移。应该提到的是，不像大多数矿石，我们的人民不能消化它。不要吃这种金属。>
Texts.Eng: <We have seeded the first Proto-World. An interesting bi-product is a new form of...dare I call it metal? It has similar properties. We have deemed it Protocite. It seems exceptionally well suited to energy transference. It should be mentioned that unlike most ore, however, our people cannot digest it. Do not eat this metal.>
